When I opened the app there was a fat man wearing a speedo running on a treadmill while licking a Cheeto. IM DISGUSTED with the way this app promoted itself to me by SHOWING ME a naked photo of MICKEY MOUSE. Wth absolutely disgusting  and not okay.   

THIS APP NEEDS TAKEN DOWN FOR THE SAFETY OF EVERYONE!!!!!!!!!!!!
